title: @Riot Will we know what mystery skin we get?
body:
I own the Riot Kayle skin through a crafting shard and i never got a notification that i recieved a mystery gift like you do when your gifted one, so i was wondering whether or not we'd get a notification or it if it just hasnt gotten to me yet.
BTW Thanks for the gifts and icons!!!!!

EDIT: i recieved a mystery gift with the 10 yr poro summoner icon but no skin yet

replies.body: It's likely that the mystery gift will show up in your store's purchase history.  It's going to take some time for everyone to get their gifts, and you won't get everything all at once.  Stay updated at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), and hang tight until this is all done!
I check in the logs and only the summoner icon was there but ill keep checking periodically, Thanks!
